com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.blob.models

Class CreateBlobSnapshotOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.blob.models.BlobServiceOptions
      • com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.blob.models.CreateBlobSnapshotOptions

  • public class CreateBlobSnapshotOptions
extends BlobServiceOptions
    Represents the options that may be set on a createBlobSnapshot request. These options include an optional server timeout for the operation, blob metadata to set on the snapshot, a blob lease ID to get a blob with an active lease, an optional start and end range for blob content to return, and any access conditions to satisfy.

      • setMetadata

        public CreateBlobSnapshotOptions setMetadata(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> metadata)
        Sets the metadata collection to associate with a snapshot. Metadata is a collection of name-value String pairs for client use and is opaque to the server. Metadata names must adhere to the naming rules for C# identifiers.

        The metadata value only affects calls made on methods where this CreateBlobSnapshotOptions instance is passed as a parameter.

        Parameters:
        metadata - A HashMap of name-value pairs of String containing the names and values of the metadata to set.
        Returns:
        A reference to this CreateBlobSnapshotOptions instance.

      • getLeaseId

        public java.lang.String getLeaseId()
        Gets the lease ID to match for the blob set in this CreateBlobSnapshotOptions instance.
        Returns:
        A String containing the lease ID set, if any.

      • setLeaseId

        public CreateBlobSnapshotOptions setLeaseId(java.lang.String leaseId)
        Sets an optional lease ID value to match when creating a snapshot of the blob. If set, the lease must be active and the value must match the lease ID set on the leased blob for the operation to succeed.

        Note that this value only affects calls made on methods where this CreateBlobSnapshotOptions instance is passed as a parameter.

        Parameters:
        leaseId - A String containing the lease ID to set.
        Returns:
        A reference to this CreateBlobSnapshotOptions instance.

      • getAccessCondition

        public AccessConditionHeader getAccessCondition()
        Gets the access conditions set in this CreateBlobSnapshotOptions instance.
        Returns:
        An AccessCondition containing the access conditions set, if any.

      • setAccessCondition

        public CreateBlobSnapshotOptions setAccessCondition(AccessConditionHeader accessCondition)
        Sets optional access conditions for creating a snapshot of the blob. The operation will return an error if the access conditions are not met.

        Note that this value only affects calls made on methods where this CreateBlobSnapshotOptions instance is passed as a parameter.

        Parameters:
        accessCondition - An AccessCondition containing the access conditions to set.
        Returns:
        A reference to this CreateBlobSnapshotOptions instance.
